ing: 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (10 inch) pie crust, baked and cooled
des: "This makes a pretty holiday pie. For an added touch you can tint some coconut green and sprinkle it on top. Originally submitted to ThanksgivingRecipe.com."
ins: Gently combine the sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, coconut, chopped nuts and drained crushed pineapple. Fold in the whipped topping. Pour batter into the prepared pie shell(s). Refrigerate for several hours before serving.
